response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and the impact it can have on your business or lifestyle, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while recognizing the high worth of the product to you. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
